description: This is a fully furnished and standard upper assembly for an AR-15-style rifle with a 16-inch, 5.56mm barrel and includes a charging handle, forward assist, and bolt carrier group.  Given the right mechanical and weapon-related knowledge, it may be fitted or dismounted from the lower frame of a suitable rifle.

This is a fully furnished and military-specification upper assembly for an AR-15-style carbine with a shortened 14.5-inch, 5.56mm barrel and includes a charging handle, forward assist, and bolt carrier group.  Given the right mechanical and weapon-related knowledge, it may be fitted or dismounted from the lower frame of a suitable rifle.

This is a fully furnished and military-specification upper assembly for an AR-15-style carbine with a shortened 10.3-inch, 5.56mm barrel and includes a charging handle, forward assist, and bolt carrier group.  Given the right mechanical and weapon-related knowledge, it may be fitted or dismounted from the lower frame of a suitable rifle.

This is a fully furnished upper assembly for an AR-15-style rifle with a 16-inch,.300 AAC Blackout barrel and includes a charging handle, forward assist, and bolt carrier group.  Given the right mechanical and weapon-related knowledge, it may be fitted or dismounted from the lower frame of a suitable rifle.  Thanks to the.300 Blackout round's similar overall dimensions to standard 5.56mm ammunition, a converted rifle may still make use of plain STANAG magazines.

This is a fully furnished and shortened upper assembly for an AR-15-style rifle with a 10.5-inch,.300 AAC Blackout barrel and includes a charging handle, forward assist, and bolt carrier group.  Given the right mechanical and weapon-related knowledge, it may be fitted or dismounted from the lower frame of a suitable rifle.  Thanks to the.300 Blackout round's similar overall dimensions to standard 5.56mm ammunition, a converted rifle may still make use of plain STANAG magazines.

This is a fully furnished and extremely short upper assembly for an AR-15-style rifle with a 7.5-inch,.300 AAC Blackout barrel and includes a charging handle, forward assist, and bolt carrier group.  Given the right mechanical and weapon-related knowledge, it may be fitted or dismounted from the lower frame of a suitable rifle.  Thanks to the.300 Blackout round's similar overall dimensions to standard 5.56mm ammunition, a converted rifle may still make use of plain STANAG magazines.
A larger cradle with a longer sling for fitting to a staff sling to enable it to throw grenades.
